products.name: Tuytsi You Beige Blazer
products.description: Tuytsi You Beige Blazer from the SOLAR - SHINE TOGETHER collection, made from premium Tuytsi fabric, soft and shape-retaining. Neutral beige color, easy to mix and match. Fitted design with round neck, long sleeves, and gentle waist cinching that flatters the figure. Suitable for office environment or formal occasions.

products.name: Kaylin Blazer - Logo Embroidered Blazer
products.description: The design is part of the "SOLAR - SHINE TOGETHER" collection, presented to fashion enthusiasts as a harmony celebrating the spirit of freedom, optimism, and the radiant beauty of women. It marks the transformation of women in modern times, overcoming the "double" standards imposed on them.

products.name: Office Croptop Shirt
products.description: The design is chosen from the Office Divas Collection, deeply imbued with modern style exclusively for women. The minimalist design language is cleverly accentuated with soft stylized details that not only enhance elegant beauty but also express independent personality and sophisticated fashion taste. The Office Croptop Shirt is a perfect combination of youthful, modern style alongside professional elegance. Made from high-quality ribbed silk material, soft, breathable, and shape-retaining. Modern and youthful croptop design, easy to mix with high-waisted pants or skirts. Delicate pleated round neckline, creating an elegant and feminine accent. Long sleeves with neat cuffs, bringing neatness and comfort. Suitable for many occasions such as work, meeting friends, or events.

products.name: Tencel Silk Blouse with Ruffled Detail
products.description: The design is chosen from the Office Divas collection, strongly embodying modern style exclusively for women. The minimalist design language is cleverly accentuated with soft decorative details that not only elevate elegant beauty but also express independent personality and sophisticated fashion taste. Tencel silk blouse with ruffled body detail creates a unique and refined appearance, helping to enhance the wearer'spersonal style. - Premium Tencel silk material, soft, breathable, and durable - Stylized ruffle design creates unique, feminine accent - Elegant long sleeves, suitable for various occasions and weather - Modern silhouette, easy to pair with skirts, trousers, or jeans - Perfect for occasions like work, parties, or meeting friends

products.name: Bloom Collar Shirt
products.description: The Bloom Collar shirt is a fusion of classic and modern styles, delivering an elegant, subtle yet striking appearance, perfect for office ladies who love creativity in their daily outfits. Made from premium cotton fabric, breathable, helping you feel comfortable throughout the long day. The shirt has a moderate length, maintains good shape and doesn'twrinkle much, ensuring a neat appearance. The stylized collar design creates a fresh, attractive focal point. Elegant three-quarter sleeves are fitting, comfortable, and easy to move in. With its elegant and versatile design, the shirt can be flexibly mixed and matched to create either a professional or youthful, dynamic style.

products.name: Sophia Elegance Blazer
products.description: The Sophia Elegance Blazer features a sophisticated fitted silhouette that accentuates body lines, delivering a polished and alluring look. The lapel collar is meticulously tailored, creating timeless elegance. - Made from premium Tuytsi fabric, soft, breathable, and maintains shape well - Sophisticated fitted design highlighting the wearer'selegant silhouette - Sharp, precise stitching offering professionalism and refinement - Easy to pair with various outfits like trousers, skirts, or dresses - Suitable for multiple occasions: office wear, meetings, events, or important gatherings

products.name: Tweed Collar Silk Shirt
products.description: Basic shirt design with regular collar, loose fit, long sleeves, and regular length. The shirt comes in two basic colors - white and beige, suitable for various occasions. The shirt uniquely features small pleats at the shoulders and cuffs, bringing a gentle and soft look. The front features silver metal buttons. The collar is combined with Tweed fabric creating an eye-catching block pattern. The shirt uses high-quality silk material that is smooth and light, gently embracing the wearer'sbody.

products.name: Tweed Otis - Round Neck Wool Coat
products.description: The Vest design on Tweed wool material brings elegance and attraction that not every fabric can achieve. The rough exterior contains feminine elegance, especially for office ladies. The Otis wool coat features a round neck, regular length, and an easy-to-wear straight silhouette. The coat has fixed buttons on the front body and sleeves. The design includes two small pockets, both creating accents and being able to hold basic items like small wallets, hair clips, or phones. The coat can be mixed with different styles, suitable for pairing with trousers, flared pants, straight pants, and skirts.

products.name: Savage Loose Blazer
products.description: The _Savage_ blazer is a fashionable design for girls who love strong and modern style. With a relaxed loose fit, this jacket not only provides comfort but also helps you assert your distinctive, classy fashion taste. The loose fit design comfortably helps conceal imperfections and creates a relaxed look while maintaining elegance. Classic blazer collar design, sharp and formal, easy to combine with many types of inner shirts. Well-fitted long sleeves that can be slightly rolled up for a more dynamic and youthful appearance. _Savage_ uses premium Tuysi fabric, helping to maintain the jacket'sshape perfectly. The fabric surface is smooth, wrinkle-resistant, suitable for office activities or frequent movement.

products.name: Oversize Piece Suits Blazer
products.description: Piece Suits participated in the FALL/WINTER fashion show. The blazer is a combination of Office Chic style and premium materials, suitable for ladies pursuing elegance and comfort. Made from soft tweed fabric that is breathable, wrinkle-resistant and maintains good shape.

products.name: Magnolia Tuytsi Blazer
products.description: The design is chosen from the YOUTIFUL collection, a harmony between the wearer and their unique beauty. The Magnolia Tuytsi Blazer is a perfect choice for those who love elegant, modern yet luxurious and trendy style. Made from premium Tuytsi fabric that is soft, breathable, and durable. Gentle round neckline creates an elegant, modern look. Relaxed straight silhouette allows easy movement and creates a slim appearance. Above-waist length brings youthfulness and freedom. Easy to mix and match with trousers, jeans, or skirts to create diverse styles.

products.name: V-neck Silk Shirt
products.description: V-neck long-sleeve shirt. Sleeve cuffs are designed with elegant pleats. The shirt features subtle embroidered flowers on the chest, delicate and refined. Made from soft silk fabric for wearer comfort. Can be mixed with office trousers, jeans or various types of skirts

products.name: Lace Crop Top with Styled Collar
products.description: A design that is both seductive and fashionable, creating a standout appearance for ladies who love feminine yet elegant style. Made from high-quality lace material, the top creates a soft, breathable, and extremely luxurious feel.

products.name: Dotted Fitted T-shirt
products.description: Dotted fitted t-shirt made from premium stretch fabric, featuring a body-hugging design that flatters your figure, with unique dot pattern. Suitable for various occasions such as street wear, work, meeting friends or dates.

products.name: Costliness Blazer
products.description: The design is chosen from the Office Divas collection, bearing a strong impression of modern style exclusively for women. The Costliness Blazer is a perfect choice for girls who love elegant, modern yet liberating style. Made from premium Tuytsi material that is soft, breathable, and durable.

products.name: Xuan Yen Ao Dai
products.description: Feel the spring in the white dress from the Yen Hoa Collection! With soft velvet material and delicately handmade floral details, the Xuan Yen ao dai set is not only a perfect combination of elegant beauty and luxury but also brings comfort and ease to the wearer. Especially, the feminine pink Yen Chau bead detail is the signature that enhances the unique graceful beauty of IVY moda'smuses.

products.name: Ladies Rayon Gilet Jacket
products.description: As part of the URBAN CHIC collection launching SPRING/SUMMER 2024 NEW COLLECTION, this design carries the mission of creating flexible transformation in new fashion. To build emotional and mental connections through gentle touch points from soft fabric, well-fitted silhouette and bringing comfortable gentleness. V-neck jacket design with trendy gilet style. The product combines 3 premium material lines of Rayon, Poly, and Spandex, delivering a smooth, comfortable structure, creating a soft feeling when touched. Additionally, the material has natural drape and water-resistant properties, breathable and cool for summer.

products.name: DIVAS Polo T-shirt
products.description: The design is chosen from the Office Divas collection, deeply embodying modern style exclusively for women. The minimalist design language is cleverly accentuated with soft stylized details that not only elevate elegant beauty but also express independent personality and sophisticated fashion taste. The classic polo collar is gently modernized, bringing sophistication and elegance, suitable for both daily wear and occasions requiring polished looks.

products.name: Dreamy Styled Collar Shirt
products.description: This design is part of the Dreamy Bloom collection, a perfect companion for women, helping them always shine. The product is made from premium materials, soft as if caressing the wearer'sskin. Every detail of the outfit is meticulously crafted, from the elegant silhouette to the feminine patterns, giving confidence in every moment.

products.name: IVY moda T-shirt
products.description: The product has a youthful, dynamic but no less trendy style, suitable for all girls who love comfort and personality in their daily style. - Soft, breathable, elastic cotton blend material - Dynamic short sleeve design, easy to mix-match - Modern Ivy Moda text print pattern, sharp and color-fast - Comfortable fit, suitable for many body types - Suitable for many occasions: street walking, work, travel or meeting friends

products.name: Straight Cut Button-down Collar Shirt
products.description: The shirt provides comfort while remaining impressive, suitable for various occasions from office to street wear. - Button-down collar design brings elegance and neatness, suitable for both office and casual styles. - Modern zipper detail creates a novel accent and adds convenience when wearing. - Comfortable straight cut helps conceal imperfections, suitable for many body types. - Breathable material, suitable for different weather conditions.

products.name: Manche Longue Pencil Skirt
products.description: The _Manche Longue_ pencil skirt embodies femininity and professionalism, with a classic pencil design that has been modernized to bring a contemporary, elegant beauty for office ladies. Choosing high-quality soft fabric with moderate stretch ensures comfort while moving while maintaining a perfect shape. The pencil silhouette hugs the body, accentuating soft curves, creating a graceful and professional appearance. Additionally, the high-waisted design helps highlight the waistline, creating the effect of longer legs that can easily be paired with various types of tops.

products.name: Chân váy Midi Leather Luxe
products.description: Chất liệu da cao cấp, mềm mại và bóng nhẹ. Thiết kế dáng chữ A cổ điển, độ dài ngang bắp chân. Màu sắc đỏ mận và đen, dễ dàng phối đồ. Phù hợp với môi trường công sở, dạo phố hoặc sự kiện sang trọng.

products.name: Embroidered Tweed Pencil Skirt
products.description: The new skirt design in IVY moda's Fall-Winter collection is a perfect combination of classical beauty through tweed material alongside the sophistication of unique floral embroidery details. The thick, premium tweed material helps the skirt maintain its shape perfectly, providing warmth and elegance, especially suitable for cool days. Choosing a fitted pencil silhouette that accentuates body curves, creating an elegant yet seductive appearance. The intricate floral embroidery is a prominent, soft highlight, making the skirt more special and attractive. This skirt can be easily paired with shirts, thin sweaters, or light jackets, suitable for both office wear and meetings or evening parties.

products.name: Khaki Mini Skirt
products.description: Khaki Mini Skirt made from Khaki material, A shape, above the knee, plain design.

products.name: Chân váy xếp ly Aurum
products.description: Chân váy Aurum nổi bật trong thiết kế xòe hiện đại bên canh điểm nhấn in hoa tinh tế, tạo nên một diện mạo cuốn hút mà sang trọng. Chất liệu Tuytsi cao cấp, mềm mại, giữ phom tốt, họa tiết hoa sang trọng. Thiết kế xếp ly nhẹ nhàng, tạo độ bồng bềnh và nữ tính. Điểm nhấn in hoa tinh tế, mang lại vẻ ngoài hiện đại, quyến rũ. Kết hợp dễ dàng với áo sơ mi, áo kiểu hoặc blazer để hoàn thiện phong cách.

products.name: Gilded Prowl Skirt
products.description: Gilded Prowl Skirt made from silk with a mermaid tail design. Part of the You product line.

products.name: Pencil Lace Skirt
products.description: The lace skirt design brings luxury and seduction, expressing elegant and attractive beauty for women. With a form-fitting design, the skirt not only accentuates body curves but also creates a sophisticated highlight, perfect for any occasion from office to events.

products.name: Pleated Flare Silk Skirt
products.description: Pleated flare silk skirt, silk material, flare design, black color. Ladies product line, Skirt product group, flare style, ankle length, plain pattern.

products.name: Palette Pencil Skirt
products.description: Palette Pencil Skirt belongs to the Ladies product line, Skirt group, pencil style, knee-length, plain pattern, made of Tuysi material.

products.name: 2-Button Striped Pencil Skirt
products.description: A knee-length pencil skirt design with a high waist that elegantly accentuates the waistline. The skirt's highlight is the two metal buttons on the side, bringing a sophisticated look to the wearer. The skirt is made from premium Tuysi fabric with a plain pattern, adding a youthful touch to the outfit. Tuysi fabric features outstanding characteristics such as durability, breathability, wrinkle resistance, and good elasticity, providing absolute comfort for the wearer. You can combine this skirt with different types of tops to create your own unique style.

products.name: Muse Tweed Pencil Skirt
products.description: The skirt is a perfect combination of luxurious Tweed material alongside an elegant pencil silhouette, creating a fashionable and attractive appearance. The premium Tweed material exudes sophistication and nobility, ideal for office environments or luxurious events. The pencil design hugs the body, accentuating a slim figure and creating soft, seductive curves. The moderate length makes the skirt more elegant and easy to combine with shirts, blouses, or blazers.

products.name: Double Layer A-line Tuysi Skirt
products.description: Short A-line skirt with high waist concealed waistband, accentuating the slim waistline. The skirt is styled with delicate floral embellishments. Made from luxurious Tuysi fabric that maintains its shape and has a slight sheen. This youthful skirt is perfect for various occasions, easy to mix and match with different tops for various styles.

products.name: Long Tuysi Skirt with Styled Waistband
products.description: Tuysi material provides structure while maintaining comfort and good absorption. Pencil style design with knee-length cut conceals flaws and enhances figure. Can be paired with shirts or t-shirts for either elegant or youthful styles.

products.name: Flared skirt with ruched waist
products.description: A lightly flared skirt with pleats in the front combined with a stylish ruched detail at the waistband. This elegant design brings a luxurious yet youthful look suitable for various occasions. Pair the skirt with a shirt, t-shirt, or blouse and you'll instantly have an outfit perfect for the office or coffee with friends.

products.name: Flared skirt with ruched waist
products.description: A slightly flared skirt with pleats in the front combined with a stylish ruched detail at the waistband. The elegant design brings a luxurious yet youthful look suitable for various occasions.

products.name: French Floral Flared Silk Skirt
products.description: Care Instructions: Part of the SAPPHIRE CHIC collection, this modern office design features French floral patterns, made from premium silk fabric that is soft and comfortable. The gentle flare design with moderate length enhances femininity and suits various body types.

products.name: Cobalt Blue Pencil Skirt
products.description: The Cobalt Blue skirt is a sophisticated blend of classic beauty and modern style. Made from premium tweed fabric, the skirt brings elegance with its distinctive woven surface, providing a sturdy yet soft feel when worn. Notably, the cobalt blue shade easily becomes a focal point for any outfit. The pencil silhouette helps accentuate feminine curves. The subtle front slit not only adds a design element but also ensures comfort during movement. The simple yet elegant design of the skirt can be easily paired with shirts, blouses, or blazers, suitable for both office environments and special occasions.

products.name: Kaiwa Tweed Check Skirt
products.description:
The autumn sunlight, though no longer dazzling, still brings a warm, gentle feeling like the softness and romance that always exists within every woman. This is the main inspiration for the delicate designs in the Muse of the Sun collection.
The modern skirt design in light yellow autumn shade brings both warmth and eye-pleasing feeling. The premium Tweed fabric exudes sophistication and nobility, ideal for office environments or elegant events.
Choosing a short A-line silhouette enhances the figure, making legs appear slimmer and longer. The skirt can be easily paired with shirts, blouses, or blazers.

products.name: Tuytsi Hiver Fitted Dress
products.description: A gentle A-line fitted dress that enhances the body's natural curves while cleverly concealing imperfections. Made from premium Tuytsi fabric that is soft, breathable, durable, and beautiful. The A-line design provides a gentle, elegant yet comfortable fit. The V-neckline is graceful, flattering, and adds a touch of sensuality. Comes with a waist belt that creates a focal point and balance for the outfit. Long sleeves, suitable for cool weather or formal styles. Appropriate for many occasions: work, parties, partner meetings, or gatherings.

products.name: Tapta Fitted Dress with Collared Neck
products.description: A perfect combination of classic and modern elements, bringing a fashionable yet graceful beauty, suitable for ladies who love elegant and confident style. The premium Tapta fabric combined with high-quality Tuysi features an artistic shiny floral surface, maintaining perfect shape and an attractive appearance. The dress has durability and wrinkle resistance, ideal for wearing on important occasions without worrying about looking unkempt. Classic collared design with subtle metallic trim that adds just enough highlight. The lower body features a stylized diagonal cut, bringing uniqueness while creating a slimming effect and skillfully accentuating the figure. A product with meticulous, precise stitching, with emphasis on pleated details to create a balanced and harmonious overall look.

products.name: Signature Flared Silk Dress with Bow Collar
products.description: The silk dress is part of the Her Signature collection featuring sophisticated stylized design details combined with subtle patterns, expressing a statement about new office fashion style - a confident, elegant yet graceful style. - Premium soft silk material with light sheen, breathable - Unique bow collar design, creating an elegant and outstanding accent - Gentle flared silhouette, bringing feminine and fluid beauty - Moderate length, easy to pair with high heels and delicate accessories - Suitable for many occasions such as parties, meeting friends or dating

products.name: V-neck Scarlet Bloom Dress
products.description: A dress that perfectly combines classic beauty and modern elegance, helping you stand out at any event. The graceful A-line design, elegant long sleeves, along with a unique V-neck detail creates an attractive focal point.

products.name: Eclipse Flared Lace Dress
products.description: With its striking color scheme, the Eclipse dress design is the perfect choice for ladies who love feminine and gentle beauty. This dress model not only 'scores points' with its modest round neckline but also with the lace accents at the dress hem, giving ladies an elegant appearance with a hint of seduction.

products.name: Tweed A Timeless Dress
products.description: The Red Tweed A TIMELESS is a symbol of elegance, luxury, and femininity. Crafted from premium tweed fabric, the dress brings a classic yet modern beauty, helping you stand out in any situation. - Premium tweed material, thick and well-structured, maintains shape well, delivering an elegant and luxurious appearance - Fashionable red color, suitable for various occasions from work to events - Graceful A-line design, unique stylized neckline, elegant long sleeves - Meticulous tailoring, knee-length sophistication, suitable for various body types

products.name: Đầm lụa Floral Glow
products.description: Lấy cảm hứng từ sắc hoa mùa xuân rực rỡ, đầm lụa Floral Glow là hiện thân của sự nhẹ nhàng, nữ tính và đầy tinh tế. Được làm từ lụa cao cấp, chiếc đầm mang đến cảm giác mềm mại, thoáng mát. Đầm nhẹ nhàng ôm lấy cơ thể, tôn lên vẻ đẹp tự nhiên của nàng. Thiết kế đầm xòe thanh thoát với điểm nhấn họa tiết hoa tinh xảo, kết hợp gam màu vàng nhã nhặn, giúp tôn lên mọi tông da. Đường cắt may khéo léo ôm sát vừa phải, tạo hiệu ứng thon gọn và thanh lịch. Đặc biệt, chi tiết cổ chữ V duyên dáng, mang lại vẻ ngoài hài hòa giữa vẻ đẹp hiện đại và cổ điển. Đầm phù hợp cho những buổi dạo phố, tiệc trà hoặc sự kiện nhẹ nhàng. Dễ dàng cùng nàng nổi bật, tự tin trong mọi ánh nhìn.

products.name: Tuysi Twilight Petals Dress
products.description: A perfect choice for elegant and sophisticated office style, the _Tuysi Twilight Petals_ fitted dress brings modern beauty while maintaining traditional grace. The dress uses premium tuysi fabric with slight stretch, providing comfort throughout the workday while maintaining an elegant appearance. The design features a gentle fitted silhouette, conforming to the body, accentuating feminine lines without compromising professionalism. The stylized neckline brings uniqueness, creating a focal point without being overly elaborate. Notably, the knee-length design enhances formality, suitable for the office environment. The dress is an ideal choice for important meetings, client meetings, or even conferences that require polished appearance while still highlighting personal style.

products.name: Off-shoulder Fitted Knit Dress
products.description: Off-shoulder knit dress with decorative tie collar, long sleeves, gathered bust, mid-calf length. The knit fabric has moderate thickness, stretches to hug the body enhancing your figure. Pair with a long coat and high boots for confident winter wear.

products.name: Velvet flared dress with puffy sleeves
products.description: Flared dress with round neck and three-quarter sleeves. High waist, fitted at waist, pumpkin-style double-layered skirt. Puffy shoulders, back zipper. Made from soft ribbed jersey fabric with light stretch.

products.name: Primal Elegance Office Dress
products.description: The design is part of Léopard De Luxe - a collection specifically for ladies seeking boldness in modern office style. The gentle V-neck fitted dress helps accentuate the body's natural curves while cleverly concealing imperfections. Made from premium Tuytsi fabric that is soft, breathable, durable and beautiful. The A-line design is gently fitted, elegant yet comfortable. The sleek V-neck is flattering and brings a touch of sensuality. Comes with a waist belt that helps create focus and balance for the outfit. Long sleeves, suitable for cool weather or elegant style. Appropriate for many occasions: work, parties, partner meetings or gatherings.

products.name: Leopard Noir Tuytsi Dress
products.description: Flared dress, long sleeves, round neck, plain pattern, Tuytsi material. Model wears size S. Height 165 cm, weight 49 kg, measurements: 81-63-90 cm.

products.name: Leopard De Luxe Jersey Dress
products.description: The _Léopard De Luxe_ dress is a unique design for girls who love personality and luxury. The highlight of the product is the trendy _leopard_ print pattern, expressing a strong style and bringing an alluring appearance. Made from premium jersey material, with light stretch, breathable and comfortable to wear. The dress comes with a stylish belt, features a gentle fitted design that accentuates body curves. Suitable for street walks, light parties, meeting friends or elegant events.

products.name: Leopard Silk Flared Dress with Collar
products.description: The Leopard Silk Flared Dress will surely make you the center of attention with its beauty that is both luxurious, distinctive, and seductive. The leopard print is a striking highlight, affirming a strong and captivating style. The classic collared design combined with a gentle flared silhouette creates balance, accentuates the slim waist, bringing a feminine yet powerful appearance.

products.name: Black Dahlia Boat Neck Dress
products.description: A simple yet captivating dress design, perfect for girls who love modern style while maintaining femininity and comfort. Made from premium Cotton jersey material, the dress provides softness, elasticity, and breathability, helping you feel comfortable throughout the day.

products.name: SOLAR Stylish V-neck Dress
products.description: SOLAR Stylish V-neck Dress from the Fall-Winter 2024 collection features a V-neck design, short sleeves, and luxurious Tweed material. The layered silhouette gracefully accentuates body curves, perfect for cool days. The burgundy color brings a classic and elegant neo-classical beauty.

products.name: Hong Yen Long Dress
products.description: Hong Yen is part of the Yen Hoa Ao Dai Collection, inspired by the serenity and brilliance of spring flowers in full bloom! To honor the gentle and delicate features, the design uses soft organza fabric with coral pink patterns delicately present on the fabric background. Along with that, the graceful straight silhouette and elegant three-quarter sleeves make Hong Yen a perfect choice for all body types, providing comfort while maintaining feminine charm. Notably, there's a special detail designed exclusively for IVY moda's muses - the Yen Chau beads peeking through the dress panels as an interesting accent that remains perfectly harmonious with the overall outfit.

products.name: V-neck Fitted Dress Fleur de
products.description: The Fleur de fitted dress is a delicate blend of elegant style and modern features, bringing a seductive and graceful beauty to the wearer. The upper body of the dress is designed with a comfortable fit, creating a light feeling while maintaining elegance. The lower body features a pencil-fit silhouette, helping to accentuate body curves, with added stylized ruffles creating unique, fashionable highlights. Made from premium Silk combined with Tuysi fabric: soft, providing comfort when worn. Stylized V-neck, comfortable upper body, and seductive fitted lower body. Ruffles on the lower body create a unique, modern touch. The dress suits various body types and is easy to mix with accessories.

products.name: Polo Sweater with Trim
products.description: Polo Sweater with Trim - Premium product line, soft wool material, classic design with delicate trim detailing. Various sizes from S to XXL, suitable for many body types. Currently available in grey-brown.

products.name: Wool Polo Shirt
products.description: The wool polo shirt belongs to the high-end Senora product line, made from premium wool material, with a slim fit design, long sleeves, stand-up collar, plain pattern, and regular length. The product needs careful maintenance, dry clean only to maintain durability and long-lasting shape.

products.name: Knitted Cardigan
products.description: High-end knitted cardigan, wool material, turtleneck, long sleeves, loose-fitting style, regular length, plain pattern.

products.description: Dark navy blue jeans, Regular fit, ankle length, Denim material, deep blue color.
